meanings.definition: To invent or create something jointly with another person.
meanings.sent1: My friend and I will coinvent a new game to play together.
meanings.sent2: The scientists decided to coinvent a solution to the problem.
meanings.sent3: Let's coinvent a secret code for our club!
meanings.sent4: Their collaboration allowed them to coinvent a groundbreaking technology.
meanings.sent5: The siblings worked together to coinvent a delicious recipe for dinner.

meanings.definition: A person who invents something jointly with another person.
meanings.sent1: She is known as a talented coinvent in the field of technology.
meanings.sent2: The coinvent received recognition for their innovative work.
meanings.sent3: The young coinventors won a prize for their creative invention.
meanings.sent4: The coinvent was excited to share their latest creation with the world.
meanings.sent5: The coinvent played a crucial role in developing the new product.
